definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cease, desist, rest (As šabâtu, prob. cease, be completed Dl:WB Zim:KAT 3. 593 (Jen:ZA iv (1889), 277 f. is sceptical); Ar. sabata cut off, interrupt; NH has [[שֶׁבֶת]] neglect, etc., Aram. [[שִׁבְתָּא]] cost of nealect);—
cease: (abs. 13 t.) of seasons Ge 8:22 (J); manna Jos 5:12 (P), etc., Is 14:4, Is 14:4, Ne 6:3 +; c. [[מִן]] Ho 7:4 + 3 t.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[מִן]] om., [[ב]] temp. Ex 23:12 (E), Ex 16:30, Ex 34:21 (J), Ex 31:17 (P); ´[[בֶּחָרִישׁ וּבַקָּחִיר שׁ]]: Ex 34:21 (J; i.e., even in these busy seasons).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִשְׁבַּת]] Is 17:3 + 2 t.; pl [[נִשְׁבְּתוּ]] Ez Eze 6:6;—cease: abs. Ez Eze 6:6, Eze 30:18, Eze 33:28; c. [[מִן]] Is 17:3.

cause to cease, put an end to: c. acc. mirth Ho 2:13, work 2Ch 16:5, Ne 4:5; sacrifice Da 9:27; war Ps 46:10, cf. Is 13:11, Ez Eze 7:24, Pr 18:18 + 6 t., + [[קוֹל שָׂשׂוֹן מִן]] ´[[הִשׁ]]: Je 7:34, Je 16:9, cf. Je 48:33.

= exterminate, destroy: c. acc. 2Ki 23:5, 2Ki 23:11, Am 8:4 (Now conj. [[העשׁקים]] ), Ho 1:4, Ps 8:3, Ps 119:119; c. acc. + [[מִן]], Je 36:29, [[מִן הָאָרֶץ]] Le 26:6 (H), Ez Eze 34:25; [[אלילים]] Eze 30:13, De 32:26.
cause to desist from: c. [[מִן]] Ez Eze 16:41, Eze 34:10, Ex 5:5 (E = give rest from); [[לְבִלְתִּי]] inf. Jos 22:25 (P).
remove ( = [[מִן הֵסִיר]]): c. [[מִן]] Ez Eze 23:27, Eze 23:48, Ps 89:45 (txt. dub.: rd. [[הִשְׁבַּתּוֹ]] [
] LXX Du; [[מַטֵּה הׂדוֹ]] Herz Che, v. also sub [[טֳהָר]]); leaven [[מבתים]] Ex 12:15 (P); [[מִפָּנֵינוּ]] ´[[ישׂר]] :´[[אֶח־ק]] :´[[הַשׁ]]: Is 30:11.
cause to fail, let be lacking: salt [[מֵעַל מִנְחָתֶָךָ]] Le 2:12 (P); acc. pers + [[ל]] pers. Je 48:35, Ru 4:14.
